meanings.definition: An object made by a human being, typically of cultural or historical interest.
meanings.sent1: The ancient artifact was carefully displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist discovered an artifact from an ancient civilization.
meanings.sent3: The artifact looked like a time-traveling souvenir.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an artifact of pure joy.
meanings.sent5: The artifact gleamed under the museum lights, captivating all who saw it.

meanings.definition: A structure or feature not naturally present but visible as a result of human activity.
meanings.sent1: The ruins of the old castle were a fascinating artifact of the past.
meanings.sent2: The artifact of the bridge showed signs of human craftsmanship.
meanings.sent3: The artifact of the hidden door puzzled the explorers.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was an artifact that shone through his actions.
meanings.sent5: The artifact of the graffiti on the wall told a story of urban life.
